text: Basha Bakri (born 1927) is a Sudanese former sports shooter. He competed in the 300 metre rifle, three positions event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Sudanese male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Sudan Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics
title: Basha Bakri
